segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the cookie jar, and she seems excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their bond, working together like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the jar, and she's right there supporting him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they share everything like this, always looking out for each other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet to see them cooperating, even if it's just to sneak some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught and scolded by their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's posture shows how much she trusts her brother to get her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit emotional watching their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
